name: Tales of the World: Tactics Union
name_original: Tales of the World: Tactics Union
description:
Tales of the World: Tactics Union is a RPG game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 02-07-2012. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
You can play Tales of the World: Tactics Union on iOS and Android.
It was scored by Go Shiina.
